yarnrepublic@gmail com follow care instruction on your yarn of choice i most often use i love this yarn acrylic and scarves do well being machine washed on the delicate cycle and tumble dried on low rowan infinity scarf pattern - yarn republic 1 pattern is written in us terms difficulty level beginner materials - 2 skeins minimum 350 yards each of worsted weight yarn i use i love this yarn acrylic you will be using two strands held together - 10 mm n/15 crochet hook - tapestry needle - scissors key - chain chain - single_crochet single_crochet - double_crochet double_crochet - st s stitch es - slip_stitch slip_stitch - blo back loop only gauge does not have to be exact for this project 9 double_crochet x 5 row = 4 x 3 75 square notes - you will be holding two strands of yarn together as one - pattern is worked in the round - do not turn - first stitch of every row is worked into the same stitch that you slip_stitch and chain - the chain 1 or chain 2 at the beginning of every row does not count as a stitch customization - chain less to start and add more row to make a cowl - change colors after every even row for a striped effect this is a great way to use scraps of yarn pattern chain 131 slip_stitch to beginning chain to create a large loop be careful not to twist your chain before joining row 1 chain 1 single_crochet across row join to first single_crochet with slip_stitch 131 row 2 chain 2 double_crochet blo across row join to first double_crochet with slip_stitch 131 row 3-14 repeat row 1 and 2 in order row 15 repeat row 1 cut yarn and sew in ends enjoy rowan infinity scarf pattern -
